channel.title: food on Foodieglobetrotter
channel.description: Recent content in food on Foodieglobetrotter

item.title: Thai basil chicken!
item.description: Have a look at my new #1min-recipe. Enjoy!

item.title: How to make stuffed peppers with tuna! EASY RECIPE!
item.description: Have a look at my new #1min-recipe for stuffed peppers. Inspired from the book “Ouzo & Mezes” by Panagiotis Alexopoulos and Anastasia Zarboni. Enjoy!

item.title: Love from South Korea-famous for Gangnam Style!
item.description: I have not visited either of the Korea’s yet but one of my close friends Luis, travels so much for work he decided that he will be sending me pictures from his travels to add to my love for food.

item.title: Chinese brunch-Dim sums anyone?
item.description: You know what I am craving for most? DIM SUMS! A typical Asian-Cantonese brunch is called “yum cha” in Hong Kong which are dim sums served with chinese tea.

item.title: Favourite brunch spot in Cork-Perry's Street
item.description: Sar and I come here often and I think we’ve ordered the same thing several times (roast chicken and warm black pudding salad). Would that be boring?

item.title: Weekend shenanigans
item.description: We spent Saturday in Killarney catching up with friends from my university. I was never very good with goodbyes despite the time spent apart, I always feel this little bit of sadness.

item.title: Nasi goreng with tofu, mushrooms, vegetables served with fried egg
item.description: Nasi goreng in english would mean fried rice. So, you would have definitely tried this dish if you have ordered Malaysian fried rice before. Today was the kind of day that we were craving for food from my home.

item.title: Smoked salmon, high fiber scone with low fat yogurt and parsley
item.description: This is one of my favourite meals to make! I got the recipe for high fiber scones from odlums. Its very simple and easy to make and only takes 20 minutes of your time!

item.title: Grilled salmon,red lentil pasta with rosso pesto & a sprinkle of parmesan served with classic caesar salad
item.description: So since I have all the time on my hands I decided to start making new dishes and decide how complementary flavors can get on my own (although I am sure there are books out there!
